title: EPA Lead Paint Warning Letters - Lead Disclosure and RRP Rule

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all information provided by the Environmental Protection Agency to Joanna McCall in response to FOIA public records request EPA-R9-2021-000592 described at https://foiaonline.gov/foiaonline/action/public/submissionDetails?trackingNumber=EPA-R9-2021-000592&type=Request

Please include any and all Environmental Protection Agency warning letters regarding the Lead-Based Paint Disclosure Rule, related to the property located at 262 Athol Avenue, Oakland California 94606.

Please include any and all Environmental Protection Agency warning letters regarding the Lead Renovation, Repair and Painting Rule, related to the property located at 262 Athol Avenue, Oakland California 94606.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anders Maxdale
